functions.name: transform
functions.signature: ($source as node(), $stylesheet as node()) as node() external

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: the input document to the transformation

returns.description: the result tree produced by the transformation

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">xslt:XSLT001 if $stylesheet is not a valid XSLT stylesheet</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">xslt:XSLT002 if result can not be imported</xqdoc:error>
